summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 LEXUS ES350. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V006000 (AIR BAGS); HOWEVER, THE PART TO DO THE REPAIR WAS UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. MARIN LEXUS OF MARIN, CALIFORNIA STATED THAT THE PARTS WERE UNAVAILABLE AND THAT THE REPAIR WOULD BE COMPLETED BY MAY OF 2017. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED, BUT DID NOT ANSWER THE PHONE OR RETURN ANY OF THE CONTACT'S CALLS. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
